item.title: Publications
item.description: Master Thesis BlastFunction: an FPGA-as-a-Service system for accelerated serverless computing Articles BlastFunction: an FPGA-as-a-Service system for accelerated serverless computing Marco Bacis , Rolando Brondolin , Marco Domenico Santambrogio   pdf   ieee A Framework with Cloud Integration for CNN Acceleration on FPGA Devices Niccolò Raspa , Giuseppe Natale , Marco Bacis , Marco Domenico Santambrogio   pdf   ieee Convolutional Neural Networks on Dataflow Engines Nils Voss , Marco Bacis , Oskar Mencer , Georgi Gaydadjiev , Wayne Luk   pdf   ieee On how to design dataflow FPGA-based accelerators for Convolutional Neural Networks Giuseppe Natale , Marco Bacis , Marco Domenico Santambrogio   pdf   ieee A Pipelined and Scalable Dataflow Implementation of Convolutional Neural Networks on FPGA Marco Bacis , Giuseppe Natale , Emanuele Del Sozzo , Marco Domenico Santambrogio   pdf   ieee Software Implementation and Hardware Acceleration of Retinal Vessel Segmentation for Diabetic Retinopathy Screening Tests Lara Cavinato , Irene Fidone , Marco Bacis , Emanuele Del Sozzo , Gianluca Carlo Durelli , Marco Domenico Santambrogio poster   pdf   ieee Patents An FPGA-As-A-Service System for Accelerated Serverless Computing
